scripts.minify.html: for file in `find public -name '*.html'`; do html-minifier --minify-js --minify-css --remove-optional-tags --collapse-whitespace --remove-redundant-attributes --remove-comments --html5 $file > $file.tmp && mv $file.tmp $file; done
scripts.minify.js: for file in `find public -name '*.js'`; do uglifyjs $file > $file.tmp && mv $file.tmp $file; done
scripts.minify.css: for file in `find public -name '*.css'`; do uglifycss $file > $file.tmp && mv $file.tmp $file; done
